196173.「プリズランポイントの交換期間は\n <%nM_trade_end_m>月<%n:
Jailrun Points can be exchanged until
<%02dM_trade_end_m>/<%02dM_trade_end_d>.
Please be mindful to use them before then.
<end>

196177.「あなたは パーティを組んでるから\n パーティメンバーと一緒に 参加してもらう:
You are in a party, so you will join with your party members. Please have the party leader call out to me and let me know that you'd like
to participate. You will then receive an invitation to join the Midnight Jailrun from the party leader.

196178.「残念だけど 真夜中プリズランの開催期間は\n 終わってしまったの。\n 機会が:
Unfortunately, Midnight Jailrun is no longer
in session. If you have a chance, please come
and play again.
<bw_break>

<speed=0>
Due to a participation penalty, you will not

minute(s) have passed.
<end>

196181.「真夜中プリズランは ８人の冒険者たちが\n 追跡チーム３人と 逃走チーム５人に:
Midnight Jailrun is a game in which 8 players are divided into two teams: Trackers, with 3 players, and Escapees, with
5 players.
The Trackers win if all 5 Escapees are caught, and the Escapees win if at least 1 Escapee remains when time runs out.

196182.「参加者は 皆 あなたと同じ冒険者。\n 『自動で探す』と『パーティを選ぶ』で\:
All participants are adventurers just like you. You can use "Auto Find" and "Select Party" to find a partner to play with. Auto
Find" allows you to play with your own party members and other adventurers. Select Party" allows you to specify which party you want to
play with. This is recommended if you only want to play with people you know. Whichever you choose, you will be assigned to a team.

196183.「追跡チームは 逃走チームに近づいて \n <convenience>で ハンド:
The Trackers team should chase after the Escapees. By pressing , you can throw a hand to catch them.
You have three hands to throw. Be careful not to use them too hastily. They'll automatically recover over time.
If you pick up a Catch Hand, you can increase the carry limit of your hands by 3. It will also recover your hands.
However, you can only carry a maximum of 10 hands at once. If you pick up any more Catch Hands, you'll just recover them.
If an Escapee touches a Catch Hand, it'll disappear. Both teams should try to pick them up as soon as they see them.
When a Catch Hand appears, you'll see it on the map. Be sure to look out for them.

What do you want to talk about?
<select_se_off>

<select_end><break>

<break>

196191.「真夜中プリズランで 遊ぶのね？\n その前に プリズランの手引きを\n 受けて:
We're playing Midnight Jailrun, right? Before
we do that, I'd like to give you a tour of
Jailrun, if that's all right.
<yesno><break>

196276.「他にも何か 説明が必要かしら？\n<select_se_off>\n遊び方につ:
Do I need to explain anything else?
<select_se_off>
How to Play
About Matching
About Hands
About Prison Lock
About Help Box
About Warp Wing
About Jailrun Point
About Uzuki
<select_end><break>

196963.「あら……ごめんなさい。真夜中プリズランの\n 開催期間は たった今 終わってし:
Sorry, Midnight Jailrun has just ended. If you
have a chance to play again, please do.
<end>

196965.「プリズランの手引きを 受けるのね？\n<yesno><break>:
So you want to know how to play?
<yesno><break>

196966.「そう……残念だわ。\n プリズランの手引きを 受けたくなったら\n いつでも:
Well...that's too bad, because if you ever
want to take Jailrun's guidance, just let me
know.

196967.「そうこなくっちゃ！\n それじゃ さっそく始めるわね。:
That's the spirit!
Okay, I'll go ahead and get started.

199751.「一緒に遊ぶ仲間を どうやって決めるのかしら？\n<select_se_off>:
Decide how you want to play.
<select_se_off>
Search Automatically
Select Nearby Party
<select_end><close>

199752.「４人で パーティを組んでいれば 一緒に遊ぶ\n もうひとつのパーティが 選べる:
If you have a party of four, you can choose
another party to play with. But you won't get
any Jailrun points. Is that okay with you?
<yesno><break>

200085.「逃走チームは 仲間が捕まってしまったら\n プリズンロックに ５回 アタックし:
The escape team must rescue their companion by tacking on the Prison Lock five times if they are caught. The method of Attack is simple:
approach the Prison Lock. Pressing the "+" button is all you have to do. In addition to Atack, you can destroy one of the locks on the Prison Lock by touching the
Prison Key. The fifth lock cannot be destroyed by the Prison Key, so you must tack directly to the Prison Lock for the last one. The
Prison Key will be marked on the map when it appears, so either team should take it as soon as they find it.

200086.「お助けボックスは 追跡チーム専用と\n 逃走チーム専用のものを 用意しているわ:
There are two types of help boxes, one for the pursuit team and one for the escape team. Please note that you will not be able to take
the other team's box. Both help boxes contain a special item Insight that will show you where the other team is on the map. A long press will affect all members of your team. If you use it well, you can make your team's situation much better. But Insight, as
powerful as it is, is short-lived. You should look at the map as soon as you use it.

200087.「ワープウィングは 触れると 一瞬で\n 別の場所に ワープできちゃうアイテムよ:
The Warp Wing is an Item that can be touched to instantly Warp to another location, and the Warp Destination can be viewed on the map. It
can be used by either team, so it's useful for both chasing and escaping. Use it to run like the wind through the city!

200088.「真夜中プリズランで 遊ぶと\n 勝ち負けに かかわらず\n プリズランポイント:
When you play Midnight Jailrun, you earn Jailrun points regardless of whether you win or lose. If you play Midnight Jailrun, you
will earn Jailrun points regardless of whether you win or lose, and if you are particularly successful, you will be rewarded with extra
points. Please note that you will not get Jailrun points if you play in the "Choose Party" mode. You can exchange your Jailrun
points for great prizes. Jailrun points can only be redeemed for a limited amount of time, until <%dM_trade_end_m>Month
<%dM_trade_end_d>. After that date, you will lose your Jailrun points, so don't forget to redeem your Jailrun points.

200089.「わたしは こう見えて 伝統文化の研究者なの。\n 最近 はやりの 仮装メイク術:
I'm actually a researcher of traditional culture, believe it or not. The recent trend of disguise makeup techniques is fascinating.
The reason I incorporated disguise makeup into Midnight Jailrun is because it excited me as a researcher.
I've always liked making and wearing costumes, so at first, I tried on all sorts of outfits.
But lately, I've been sticking to this look. After all, it's perfect for catching my prey!
I'm going to find that ghostly cosmetician and make him my minion, just like I did with Scram here!
And while I'm at it, I'd really like to do something about my sister's mummy outfit that she's always flaunting as some "treasure"...
But to think that you all get to play while wearing my outfitsーAhh... Just imagining it gets me all giddy!

200562.「そう……残念だわ。\n 気が変わったら また 来てちょうだいね。:
Well... that's too bad. If you change your
mind, please come again.

250518.「今回のプリズランで 遊んだ戦績よ。\n<break>:
Here are the results from this year's Jailrun.
<break>

250532.「真夜中プリズランは ８人の冒険者たちが\n 追跡チーム３人と 逃走チーム５人に:
Midnight Jailrun is a game in which 8 players are divided into two teams: Trackers, with 3 players, and Escapees, with
5 players.
The Trackers win if all 5 Escapees are caught, and the Escapees win if at least 1 Escapee remains when time runs out.

250533.「参加者は 皆 あなたと同じ冒険者。\n 『自動で探す』と『パーティを選ぶ』で\:
All participants are adventurers just like you. You can use "Auto Find" and "Select Party" to find a partner to play with. Auto
Find" allows you to play with your own party members and other adventurers. Select Party" allows you to specify which party you want to
play with. This is recommended if you only want to play with people you know. Whichever you choose, you will be assigned to a team.

250534.「追跡チームは 逃走チームに近づいて \n <convenience>で ハンド:
The Trackers team should chase after the Escapees. By pressing , you can throw a hand to catch them.
You have three hands to throw. Be careful not to use them too hastily. They'll automatically recover over time.
If you pick up a Catch Hand, you can increase the carry limit of your hands by 3. It will also recover your hands.
However, you can only carry a maximum of 10 hands at once. If you pick up any more Catch Hands, you'll just recover them.
If an Escapee touches a Catch Hand, it'll disappear. Both teams should try to pick them up as soon as they see them.
When a Catch Hand appears, you'll see it on the map. Be sure to look out for them.

250535.「逃走チームは 仲間が捕まってしまったら\n プリズンロックに 何度か アタック:
The escape team must rescue their companion by tacking on the Prison Lock several times once the companion has been captured. The method of
atack is simple: approach the Prison Lock and Pressing the "+" button is all you have to do. In addition to Atack, you can destroy one of the locks on the Prison Lock by touching the
Prison Key. The last lock cannot be destroyed by the Prison Key, so you must tack it directly to the Prison Lock. The Prison Key
will be marked on the map when it appears, so either team should take it as soon as they find it.

250536.「お助けボックスは 追跡チーム専用と\n 逃走チーム専用のものを 用意しているわ:
There are two types of help boxes, one for the pursuit team and one for the escape team. Please note that you will not be able to take
the other team's aid box. The pursuit team has a Search Lamp that will enlarge the body of the fugitive, making it easier to locate them.
The getaway team has Insight, which will show the tracker's location on the map for a certain amount of time. Both of these can be
used to give your team a big advantage if you use them well.Long press to use it!

250537.「ワープウィングは 触れると 一瞬で\n 別の場所に ワープできちゃうアイテムよ:
The Warp Wing is an Item that can be touched to instantly Warp to another location, and the Warp Destination can be viewed on the map. It
can be used by either team, so it's useful for both chasing and escaping. Use it to run like the wind through the village!

250538.「真夜中プリズランで 遊ぶと\n 勝ち負けに かかわらず\n プリズランポイント:
Whenever you play Midnight Jailrun, you earn Jailrun points regardless of whether you win or lose. You can exchange your Jailrun points
for great prizes. In addition, those who are awarded in the results will receive special rewards based on the number of times they have
played! Please note that Jailrun points and rewards do not reflect the results of "Choose Party". And please note that you have until
<%dM_trade_end_m>Month <%dM_trade_end_d> to redeem your Jailrun points and to receive your rewards. After this period, you will lose your
Jailrun points and your war results, so don't forget to redeem your Jailrun points.

250539.「わたしは こう見えて 伝統文化の研究者なの。\n 最近 はやりの 仮装メイク術:
I'm actually a researcher of traditional culture, believe it or not. The recent trend of disguise makeup techniques is fascinating.
The reason I incorporated disguise makeup into Midnight Jailrun is because it excited me as a researcher.
I've always liked making and wearing costumes, so at first, I tried on all sorts of outfits.
But lately, I've been sticking to this look. After all, it's perfect for catching my prey!
I'm going to find that ghostly cosmetician and make him my minion, just like I did with Scram here!
And while I'm at it, I'd really like to do something about my sister's mummy outfit that she's always flaunting as some "treasure"...
But to think that you all get to play while wearing my outfitsーAhh... Just imagining it gets me all giddy!

Midnight Jailrun is a game in which 8 players are divided into two teams: Trackers, with 3 players, and Escapees, with

317160.「参加者は 皆 あなたと同じ冒険者。\n 『自動で探す』と『パーティを選ぶ』で\:
All participants are adventurers just like you. You can use "Auto Find" and "Select Party" to find a partner to play with. Auto
Find" allows you to play with your own party members and other adventurers. Select Party" allows you to specify which party you want to

317161.「追跡チームは 逃走チームに近づいて \n <convenience>で ハンド:
The Trackers team should chase after the Escapees. By pressing , you can throw a hand to catch them.
You have three hands to throw. Be careful not to use them too hastily. They'll automatically recover over time.
If you pick up a Catch Hand, you can increase the carry limit of your hands by 3. It will also recover your hands.

317162.「逃走チームは 仲間が捕まってしまったら\n プリズンロックに 何度か アタック:
If your companions are caught, you must attack the Prison Lock several times to release them.
Attacking is simple. Just face the lock and press .
In addition to attacking the Prison Lock, you can also pick up Prison Keys scattered about.
However, the final lock cannot be unlocked with a key, so you must attack it to fully unlock it.
If a Tracker picks up a key, it'll disappear. Both teams should try to pick up keys as soon as they see them.
When a Prison Key appears, it'll appear on the map. Pay close attention to it.

317163.「お助けボックスは 追跡チーム専用と\n 逃走チーム専用のものを 用意しているわ:

317164.「ワープウィングは 触れると 一瞬で\n 別の場所に ワープできちゃうアイテムよ:

You can check where a Warp Wing will warp you by looking at the map. Either team can use it, so it's useful for both.
Use them well, and run like the wind!
